main.name: Emil Ekman
main.bio: I'm Emil, a Finnish student from Turku studying ICT at the Turun ammatti-instituutti. In this portfolio you'll find some of my projects and skills which I have developed during my studies.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: Technology has been an essential part of my life. I started programming in my mid teens and I got to know the beauty in the logical thinking and problem-solving aspect in math and science. In 2019 I enrolled into an ICT degree, which I will soon finish.
